HlthCareProvTreatedCondition.name: HlthCareProvTreatedCondition
HlthCareProvTreatedCondition.description: Represents a junction object between a healthcare provider, facility, or practitioner and a problem definition that's related to a health condition, such as disease or illness.

EffectiveFrom.description: The date when the provider began treating the condition.

EffectiveTo.description: The date when the provider stopped treating the condition.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the provider is actively treating the condition (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The name of this association between a healthcare provider, facility, or practitioner, and a problem definition that's related to a health condition.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.
